misuse: CWE-757: Selection of Less-Secure Algorithm During Negotiation.
description: The code does not specify the mode and padding for the AES algorithm, which can lead to the selection of less-secure defaults. Depending on the JRE version and provider, the default mode and padding may not provide the desired level of security.
recommendation: Specify the mode and padding explicitly when obtaining the cipher instance. For example, use Cipher.getInstance("AES/GCM/NoPadding") for GCM mode with no padding.
